Hi, my name is Simon Coudeville. I design & build responsive interfaces for the web. I focus on frontend-design, HTML & CSS and web typography.

Some of my work is on Dribbble and my thoughts are on Twitter. I’m currently a senior web-designer at wijs in Ghent and a nerd at Nerdlab. I help developing Chopstick, a frontend-design framework.

© 2016 Simon Coudeville. That's it for now…
